title: Supposed to have 4G, unlimited data. In settings do I choose global or lte?
content: I've had this phone for 2 years, I had the same problem a couple of months in, Verizon fixed it. About 2 weeks ago the same issue.. tried by factory data reset my phone and internet is still slow.not to mention my tablet doesn't work without WIFI AT ALL even thought we pay for it's unlimited 4G and it has its own number!! Please help
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
